title: Selected Short Stories
description: This collection of the short stories of Nobel Laureate and celebrated Indian writer Rabindranath Tagore is the first title in the series The Oxford Tagore , a major new project to publish the English translations of a wide variety of Tagore's writings including his poetry, non-fiction prose, and fiction. The translations edited by well-known scholar and translator Sukanta Chaudhuri are authoritative and readable.
author: Rabindranath Tagore
